title: Star Lovers
description: Lucinda has had a really rough night. Her boyfriend was drunk, she had no way home, and he would not let her have the keys to the SUV. So she began walking, and along the way she met Wilson, a strange man who claimed to have learned the means to expand the portion of the brain humans can routinely use.He shows her he has the power to heal. He shows her he can move at the speed of light. What he cannot do, yet, is make love at the event horizon of a super massive black hole.No one is perfect, right?
author: Jim Henry
